lead_paragraph: Dustin Pedroia had a grand slam and a solo home run, David Ortiz passed two Hall of Fame Red Sox on the extra-base hitting list, and host Boston beat the Atlanta Braves, 9-4.

headline.print_headline: Pedroia’s Grand Slam Powers Red Sox
headline.main: Dustin Pedroia’s Grand Slam Powers Red Sox; Nintendo Sells Control of Mariners

snippet: Dustin Pedroia had a grand slam and a solo home run, David Ortiz passed two Hall of Fame Red Sox on the extra-base hitting list, and host Boston beat the Atlanta Braves, 9-4.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Boston Red Sox defeat Atlanta Braves, 9-4; other MLB scores and news noted.
